snippet: Mr. Duterte, whose government is carrying out a deadly war on drugs, was angered by what he said was the United States’ refusal to sell weapons to the Philippines....
abstract: Philippines Pres Rodrigo Duterte, angry over United States' refusal to sell arms to his government, says Pres Obama can 'go to hell'; threatens to obtain weapons from Russia or China.

byline.contributor: Felipe Villamor contributed reporting from Manila, and Gardiner Harris from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Duterte, whose government is carrying out a deadly war on drugs, was angered by what he said was the United States’ refusal to sell weapons to the Philippines.

headline.main: Rodrigo Duterte, Philippines’ Leader, Says Obama ‘Can Go to Hell’
headline.print_headline: Philippines’ Leader Says Obama ‘Can Go to Hell’
